author: hlship
msg: Remove required and requiredMessage parameters from TextField, TextArea and DatePicker (that logic supplied by Required).
Modify AbstractValidatableField to not extend AbstractRequireableField, plus other related refactorings.

author: hlship
msg: Refactor the Translator and Validator interfaces, adding support objects as parameters, which greatly simplifies creating implementations of the interfaces.

author: hlship
msg: Fix minor problems in documentation files.

author: hlship
msg: Add cancel and refresh listener parameters to Form.
